DOC.brief_summary: Up 10 subject enrol . All subject receive increase density UltherapyTM treatment dual depth . Treatments provide low 2/3 face neck . Follow-up visit occur 90 180 day post-treatment . Study image obtain pre-treatment , 30-60 min post-treatment , follow-up visit .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study : Treatment Post-surgery Surgery Naive Patients Who Failed Respond Previous Ulthera Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single-site , non-randomized clinical trial efficacy additional Ultherapy™ treatment subject minimal non-responders Day 90 previous Ulthera clinical trial . Global Aesthetic Improvement Scale score patient satisfaction questionnaire obtain .
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 30 65 year . Subject good health . BMI < 30 . Skin laxity submental area demonstrate grade II III Knize scale classification cosmetic deformity cervicomental angle Previous participation ULT107 , adequate compliance treatment followup visit . Groups ( surgery surgery naïve ) designate base group assign ULT107 ) . Have concomitant surgical skin tightening procedure since Ultherapy™ treatment ULT107 . Pregnant , lactating , plan become pregnant , and/or use reliable form birth control . Presence active systemic local skin disease may affect wound healing . Severe solar elastosis . Excessive subcutaneous fat cheek . Excessive skin laxity lower face neck Significant scar area treat . Open wound lesion area treat . Severe cystic acne area treat
